## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G21120](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G21120)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AAT1, AtCAT1, CAT1</u>
- **Gene Name:** amino acid transporter 1, CATIONIC AMINO ACID TRANSPORTER 1
- **Description:**   amino acid transporter 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
